column2: Through glorious conquest and magnificent diplomacy, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has finally reunited the Celts of Western Europe

The Celts were once a powerful and widespread culture, but they were pushed to the margins of Western Europe and have become hopelessly fractured. However, if a particularly dynamic leader was able to reunite the Celts, the resurgent Celtic Empire would become a force to be reckoned with...
[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns at least one province of §Y[This.Culture.GetName] culture§!

[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns at least 20 provinces of §Yany Celtic culture§! in the §YWestern Europe§! region
[This.GetTitledFirstName] owns every province of §YCeltic culture§! in the §YWestern Europe§! region
